name: BloggingSchool
0:
”Alexa, open blogging school”
”Alexa, start blogging school”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blogging school
des:
Alexa can help you learn new facts about blogging or can help you catch up on blogging facts you forgot. 
Tips for skill use:
- You can review the flash cards and then test your knowledge. 
- At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review mode. Review More lets you preview the answers before a test.
- Say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. Test Mode quizzes you on facts; Alexa says the term, you say the definition. 
- You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. 
- At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
Notes: Some of the information in this Skill may be inaccurate. If information in this Skill is inaccurate, please write a review and we'll fix it. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
